solutions.code:

line_length:
  warning: 150
  error: 200

// swiftlint:disable:next line_length
let longLine = ...

errors.cause: Using ! to unwrap optionals can cause runtime crashes

solutions.code: let value = optional ?? defaultValue
let result = optional?.property

solutions.code:

private func bindData() { ... }

# .swiftlint.yml

errors.cause: Class/struct exceeds configured line limit (default: 200 lines)

solutions.code:
class MyClass { /* core */ }
extension MyClass: Protocol { /* conformance */ }

// Move nested types to separate files
struct MyClass.NestedType { ... }

errors.message: Types or statements are too deeply nested
errors.cause: Exceeds maximum nesting level (default: 4 for types, 5 for statements)

solutions.code:
// Move deeply nested type to top level
struct InnerType { }

guard condition else { return }
// reduces nesting
private func handleNestedCase() { ... }
